content: Hello, I'm wondering if FHIR Java models have been completely merged with HAPI in the current version. Up to version 1.4 we were able to download Java models from the main and download pages, e.g. "Java" at http://hl7.org/fhir/2016May/downloads.html linked to http://hl7.org/fhir/2016May/fhir-1.4.0-Java-1.0.zip. But in the current and 2016Sep versions "Java" doesn't have a link. The file is still available for download by entering http://hl7.org/fhir/2016Sep/fhir-1.6.0-Java-1.0.zip or http://hl7-fhir.github.io/fhir-1.7.0-Java-1.0.zip, but since it's hidden, I'm wondering whether we are not supposed to keep using it.
well, we are encouraging people to use HAPI as the release mechanism for that code (same code is released with HAPI)
Thank you @Grahame Grieve, we'll get the new Java models from HAPI then.
HAPI doesnt seem to include the converters from RI, is there any plan to release the converters (org.hl7.fhir.convertors) as a separate artifact to maven central?
